title: J. Government Requests for Information
intro: As a business-to-business enterprise application provider, Sygence may occasionally receive formal requests from government authorities or similar entities (“Requesting Party”) seeking access to information that may include customer data (“Request”).
section1: In such instances, Sygence will clearly communicate to the Requesting Party that all customer data stored within any Sygence-managed cloud system is owned by the respective customer, not by Sygence, and is treated as confidential.
section2: Accordingly, Sygence will not produce or disclose any such data without first fulfilling its contractual obligation to notify the affected customer of the Request. This notice is provided solely for the purpose of informing or consulting with the customer. The final decision to disclose or withhold such data shall rest exclusively with Sygence, subject to applicable legal obligations.
footer: Sygence remains committed to safeguarding customer data in strict accordance with its legal and contractual responsibilities.
